short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A reminder to not trust the internet today!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a red flag in the top left corner to remind you that its April Fools day, while you surf popular technology websites.

Websites supported:

arstechnica.com
bgr.com
businessweek.com
cnet.com
engadget.com
gizmodo.com
lifehacker.com
pcworld.com
techcrunch.com
facebook.com
upworthy.com
mashable.com
reddit.com
theverge.com
thenextweb.com
slashdot.org
